Summary: To report historical and expected growth rates in operating metrics. The historical growth rates are compounded, annual values (CAGR).
Vars: Number of firms in the industry grouping.

Average of compounded annual growth rate in net income over last 5 years, among firms that have been in existence > 5 years. Only includes firms with positive earnings five years ago and current year.
Average of compounded annual growth rate in revenues over last 5 years, among firms that have been in existence > 5 years.
Expected Growth in Revenues - Next 2 years
Average of analyst estimates of annual growth rate in revenues for next two years.
Analyst forecast of expected growth in revenues
Expected Growth in EPS - Next 5 years
Average of analyst estimates of annual growth rate in earnings  per sahre for next five years.
Analyst forecast of expected growth in earnings per share
table_name: Industry Financial Performance and Growth Projections
table_summary: This table provides a comprehensive overview of the financial performance and growth projections for various industries. It includes the number of firms in each industry, the Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) in net income and revenues over the last 5 years, and the expected growth in revenues and Earnings Per Share (EPS) over the next 2 and 5 years. This data is useful for analyzing past performance and making future projections for different industries.
